text: Mala Sinha (born Alda Sinha; 11 November 1936) is an Indian actress. Her best known roles were in Pyaasa (1957), Anpadh (1962), Dil Tera Deewana (1962), Gumrah (1963), Bahurani (1963), Gehra Daag, Apne Huye Paraye, Jahan Ara, Himalaya Ki God Mein (1965), Nai Roshni, Aankhen (1968), Maryada (1971) and Babu. ==References== ==Other websites== * *A Biography *Mala Sinha's love story-The Times Of India Category:1936 births Category:Living people Category:Indian movie actors Category:Indian television actors Category:Indian Christians
title: Mala Sinha
